c74object.name: abc.mc.linrandenv~
c74object.description: abc.mc.linrandenv~ provides multichannel envelopes based on linear segments. A probability distribution is applied to each channel providing for each envelope a factor that is 1 or 0 and enables to apply a statistic duration of silence.

objarg.name: instances
objarg.description: sets the number of modules of envelopes [init=1:min=1:max=16]

method.name: freq
method.description: sets the frequency of the envelope generated [init=0.5:min=0.01:max=100:step=0.01].
method.digest: sets the frequency of the envelope generated

method.name: rarefaction
method.description: sets the proportion of envelope played. If the rarefaction is 0.3, it means 30% of the envelopes are muted (multiplied by 0) and 70% of them are played (multiplied by 1). When the rarefaction is 0., the envelope is constantly played, whereas when it is 1 no sound is played at all (maximum rarefaction).[init=0:min=0:max=1:step=0.001].
method.digest: sets the proportion of envelope played.

method.name: spread
method.description: controls the phase between the envelopes of the various channels: 0 means no dephasing, 1 means maximum dephasing (for instance half a period when there are 2 channels).[init=0:min=0:max=1:step=0.001].
method.digest: controls the phase between the envelopes of the various channels
